name: Modmail Premium Logviewer
description: Premium version of logviewer that includes OAuth2 support.

MONGO_URI.description: MongoDB connection URI that contains your modmail logs.

GUILD_ID.description: Guild ID of your Modmail inbox server (required to enable OAuth2)

TOKEN.description: Your Modmail bot token (required to enable OAuth2)

OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID.description: Bot Client ID that can be found in Discord dev portal (required to enable OAuth2)

OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Bot Client secret that can be found in Discord dev portal (required to enable OAuth2)

OAUTH2_REDIRECT_URI.description: Add this in the format https://appname.herokuapp.com/callback, replacing appname with the name of your logviewer app.
